text: @realDonaldTrump I’m not afraid of the Coronavirus for many logical reasons. But you & your numerous tweets calling it a hoax were poor leadership, as usual. Your freakish need to deny the reality of anything bad is mind-boggling. You can’t ignore things out of existence. You’re a very weak man.
